programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With startling new information about the shapeshifter, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) hurry to protect their friends while Allison (Crystal Reed) is given an investigative task by her family. And there is "panic at the disco."

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Lydia (Holland Roden) makes connections about the bite from Peter (Ian Bohen). Jackson (Colton Haynes) causes problems for Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) has a crisis of faith in his leadership abilities.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: During a secret concert, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) come up with a method to trap the new shapeshifter. At the same time, Allison's mother (Eaddy Mays) comes up with a plan of her own to take care of Scott once and for all.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Even as his relationship with Allison (Crystal Reed) is further strained, Scott (Tyler Posey) must attend Lydia's (Holland Roden) birthday party while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) locks up his new wolves on their first full moon together.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With a secret revealed, Scott (Tyler Posey), Stiles (Dylan O'Brien), Melissa and Stilinski are taken hostage in the Sheriff's station. Allison (Crystal Reed) then tracks Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) to the station, bringing Argent and Gerard with her.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) must help win the championship lacrosse game while also trying to figure out how to stop Gerard (Michael Hogan). At the same time, Alison (Crystal Reed) and Argent (JR Bourne) continue their hunt of Derek (Tyler Hoechlin).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the second season finale, although everyone is still reeling from a shocking death on the lacrosse field, Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends rush to figure out Gerard's (Michael Hogan) master plan…but Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) has his own plan.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the exciting Season 3 premiere, a new Alpha Pack arrives to wreak havoc on Scott's (Tyler Posey) life, while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) and Isaac (Daniel Sharman) struggle to locate Erica (Gage Golightly) and Boyd (Sinqua Walls).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Allison and Lydia stumble on a clue to finding Boyd and Erica, while a childhood friend of Stiles goes missing. Meanwhile, Derek is surprised by the reappearance of someone from his past…someone he thought had died in the Hale house fire.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With Boyd (Sinqua Walls) and Cora (Adelaide Kane) on the loose and under the influence of the full moon, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) find that they may have to turn to an unlikely ally for help…Chris Argent (JR Bourne).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: While Scott (Tyler Posey) tries to keep Isaac (Daniel Sharman) from engaging in a deadly confrontation with the Twins in school, Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) attempts to prove his theory that the killings have absolutely nothing to do with werewolves.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: During a bus ride to a cross country meet, Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends flash back to the events of a preemptive strike against the Alphas that has left several injured and possibly one or more dead.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Stranded at a motel in Fairvale, California for the night because of a postponed meet, Scott (Tyler Posey) and the others suffer strange experiences that cause them to believe members of their own group may the mysterious killer's newest targets.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: As the danger begins to move closer to Scott (Tyler Posey) his trusted mentor and boss, Deaton (Seth Gilliam), is threatened. Meanwhile, Kali (Felisha Terrell) and the twins (Charlie Carver and Max Carver) go after Derek (Tyler Hoechlin).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Seeking answers, Scott (Tyler Posey). Allison (Crystal Reed) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) hear stories told by two unlikely narrators -- Peter (Ian Bohen) and Gerard (Michael Hogan) -- and discover a secret about the color of a werewolf's eyes.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: As Allison (Crystal Reed) begins to suspect someone close to her may be involved in the murders, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) conclude that Lydia's (Holland Roden) rising talents may be their best bet to solving the murders.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Trapped inside an evacuated Beacon Hills hospital during a powerful storm, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) must defend themselves against the Alphas while trying to figure out how to save Cora's (Adelaide Kane) life.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With the threat growing more personal and time running out, Scott (Tyler Posey) is forced to make a difficult choice to save family and friends while, at the same time, Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) and Peter (Ian Bohen) try to figure out how to save Cora.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the mid-season finale, under Deaton's advice, Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends use an ancient but dangerous ritual to help them both save the lives of the people they love and stop Deucalion (Gideon Emery) from achieving his sinister goal.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Weeks after saving the lives of their parents, Scott, Stiles and Allison suffer strange side effects from their ritual sacrifice. At the same time, the newly enlightened Sheriff Stilinski scours through old cases, looking for supernatural causes.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends race to figure out how to catch the Werecoyote Malia before it's hunted down and killed by her father. Meanwhile, Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) and Peter (Ian Bohen) are broken out of captivity by an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: On the night before Halloween, Mischief Night, a convicted murderer brought to Beacon Hills Hospital for surgery escapes, forcing Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends to step in to help when his unexpected target becomes clear.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With Beacon Hills under curfew due to the power outage, the teens decide to throw a black light Halloween party while Scott (Tyler Posey) tries to get Kira (Arden Cho) to trust him in the midst of an attack by a strange new threat.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott's friends pledge to protect him against an increasingly hostile enemy, while Argent, Isaac and Allison search the past for answers to the shadow creatures. At the same time, Stiles, fearing he is going insane, reaches out to Melissa for help.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: After suffering from hallucinations for some time, Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) mysteriously disappears one night and it's up to Scott (Tyler Posey) and the gang to figure out whether he has been kidnapped…and if the Oni had anything to do with it.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) mysteriously reappears, but is he himself? Meanwhile, Scott (Tyler Posey) must prevent a disaster and Lydia (Holland Roden) and Allison (Crystal Reed) seek help from an unlikely source...Peter Hale (Ian Bohen).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Stiles checks himself into a mental hospital named Echo House where he believes he will be safe from the Nogitsune. Will he be as far away from it as he thinks or closer than ever? Meanwhile Scott, Allison and Lydia look for a cure for him.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: While Allison, Derek, Chris and Sheriff Stilinski try to track down Nogitsune, Kira's mother tells the story of the Nogitsune she came to know. Meanwhile, the Nogitsune has taken complete control of Stiles and manages to stay one step ahead.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With the Nogitsune still in control of their friend Stiles, Scott and Lydia find an unlikely ally in Peter Hale. Elsewhere, the effects of the Nogitsune have given Chris, Alison and Kira some trouble with four out-of-control werewolves.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) and company race to rescue Lydia (Holland Roden) from the clutches of evil and get help from a young woman who has escaped from the metal hospital. But the Nogitsune makes a surprise move, resulting in a tragic loss to the group.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the Season 4 finale, struck by disaster and nearly defeated, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) call on their friends and allies to make one last stand against the Nogitsune. And someone thought dead makes a surprising return.
